phishing.title: What is Phishing?
phishing.contentHtml: Phishing is a social engineering attack where attackers impersonate trusted entities to steal credentials or information.

phishing.title: Spotting Phishing Emails
phishing.contentHtml: Learn how to inspect headers, check sender addresses, and spot suspicious links.

phishing.title: Responding to Phishing Attempts
phishing.contentHtml: Steps to report and remediate phishing incidents.

passwords.title: Creating Strong Passwords
passwords.contentHtml: Techniques for building strong, memorable passwords and why password managers help.

passwords.title: Using Password Managers
passwords.contentHtml: How to choose and use a password manager safely.

social.title: Defending Against Social Engineering
social.contentHtml: Practical steps to verify requests and reduce risk.
